price: 45. Dan Nuh memohon kepada Tuhannya sambil berkata, “Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya anakku adalah termasuk keluargaku, dan janji-Mu itu pasti benar. Engkau adalah hakim yang paling adil.”
arabic: وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٞ رَّبَّهُۥ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ ٱبۡنِي مِنۡ أَهۡلِي وَإِنَّ وَعۡدَكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنتَ أَحۡكَمُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wanādā nūḥun rabbahu faqāla rabbi inna ib'nī min ahlī wa-inna waʿdaka al-ḥaqu wa-anta aḥkamu al-ḥākimīna
